channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024110157
item.description:
Report X-2024110157

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-25
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RECIEVED CALL FOR LEAKING PACKAGE, FOLLOWED DECISION TREE, NOTIFIED RMP, HYDROFUORIC ACID PRODUCT. CONTAINED SPILL IN TRAY RETURNED TO PSC, UTILIZED SCBA, RESEALED BUCKET, CONTAINERIZED INTO 55 GAL DRUM. PROCESSING AS FWN

item.title: Report X-2024101788
item.description:
Report X-2024101788

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-01T09:15:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-19
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO DEAL WITH POTENTIAL LEAKER. DURING DAMAGE INSPECTION, PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO BE EXTERNALLY AFFECTED AND CONTAIN AN AIRBAG UNIT. CHECK OF SDS REVEALED AIRBAG INFLATOR UNIT TO BE A LQ, AND UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT POLICY WAS INITIATED.

item.title: Report X-2024101783
item.description:
Report X-2024101783

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-01T09:15:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-12
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON BY AN AUTO PART. WHEN OPENED IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE PACKAGE CONTAINED 800 .308 WINCHESTER CARTRIDGES AND HAD NO LIMITED QUANTITY LABEL ON THE OUTSIDE. REWRAP; PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON; NO DAMAGE TO AMMO
